meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being wonkish.
meanings.sent1: Her wonkishness in discussing policy details impressed the audience.
meanings.sent2: His wonkishness about computer programming made him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The wonkishness of the professor was evident in his extensive collection of academic papers.
meanings.sent4: The wonkishness of the engineer shone through in his intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The wonkishness of the book club leader made every discussion engaging.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a wonk.
meanings.sent1: The wonkishness of the student council president was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: Her wonkishness in solving complex problems was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The wonkishness of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His wonkishness in fixing gadgets earned him the nickname 'Tech Wizard'.
meanings.sent5: The wonkishness of the detective in solving mysteries was legendary.

meanings.definition: Excessive interest in minor details or technicalities.
meanings.sent1: His wonkishness about fonts led to a heated debate in the design team.
meanings.sent2: The wonkishness of the accountant saved the company from financial errors.
meanings.sent3: The wonkishness of the chef in perfecting recipes sometimes resulted in unusual dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her wonkishness in organizing files made her the go-to person in the office.
meanings.sent5: The wonkishness of the scientist in analyzing data was crucial for the research project.
